doc:
Georges Gabriel Thenon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georges_Gabriel_Thenon 0 Georges Gabriel Thenon, pen name and stage name Rip, (28 February 1884 – 25 May 1941 ) was a French chansonnier, draughtsman, librettist and revues creator. Rip wrote successful revues some of which were interpreted inter alia by Mistinguett, Raimu, Arletty, Michel Simon. Georges_Gabriel_Thenon , pen_name_and_stage_name_Rip , ( 28_February_1884 – 25_May_1941 ) was a_French_chansonnier , draughtsman_,_librettist_and_revues_creator . Rip wrote successful_revues some of which were_interpreted inter_alia by Mistinguett , Raimu , Arletty , Michel_Simon .
